predicate.note: Frames file for 'reset' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: return to start value

example.name: passive
example.text: The rate on the notes will be reset annually to give the issue a market value of 101.
example.arg: to give the issue a market value of 101

example.name: passive with value
example.text: However, the maximum coupon at which the notes can be reset is 16 1/4%.

example.name: active
example.text: John reset the computer with a sledgehammer.

roleset.note: For sense as in "John set and reset the table a hundred times before he was satisfied" refer to 'set'.
